formalpara.title: Figure 7. Generating promoter::ORF::gfp
formalpara.para: The promoter::ORF::gfp vector is generated by a multi-site LR reaction between pENTRY-prom, pENTRY-ORF and pDEST-MB14. In this reaction, attL sites recombine with corresponding attR sites. The resulting plasmid, promoter::ORF::gfp, contains the promoter, ORF and GFP in frame with each other. pENTRY-ORF vectors are specifically designed to recombine in frame with GFP from pDEST-MB14.
